titleStmt.title: The great boobee To a pleasant new tune: or, Sallengers round.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for F. Coles, in VVine-street, on Safforn-hill [sic], near Hatton-Garden,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "My friend, if you will understand".
Another edition has "Salengers" in title, "friends" in line 1 of verse, and lacks "Safforn-hill" in imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
